CHAT.comment: KEVIN WIGGINS, Petitioner v. SEWALL SMITH, WARDEN, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DONALD B. VERRILLI, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GARY E. BAIR ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAN HIMMELFARB ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DONALD B. VERRILLI, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:03 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
